forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. High 58F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with showers and thunderstorms likely. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Locally heavier rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers along with a few thunderstorms. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Locally heavier rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the morning, then variable cloudiness during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 14C. Winds WSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the morning, then mainly cloudy in the afternoon with periods of light rain developing. High 56F. Winds WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers during the evening giving way to periods of light rain overnight. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 51F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 52F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 11C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High near 50F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 39F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 40F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 51F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 42F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
